import React from 'react' // Material ui import { Divider, IconButton, Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardMedia, Avatar, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Edit' // Cloudinary import { Image } from 'cloudinary-react' import './style.css' const useStyles = makeStyles(() => ({ root: { display:'flex', justifyContent:'center', margin:'30px' }, media: { height: '250px', width:'250px', }, previewmedia: { width:'300px', height:'200px' }, fab: { position:'fixed', bottom: '10px', left: '75%', whiteSpace: 'nowrap', zIndex: '50px', borderRadius:'20px', backgroundColor:'lightblue' }, follow:{ textAlign:'right' }, card: { backgroundImage:'linear-gradient(#e6ecff, #99b3ff, #ffcccc)', "&:hover": { opacity:'0.8' } }, title: { fontWeight:'600', fontSize:'16px' }, divider: { margin:'15px 0px' }, })) const VacationCard = ({ product, editVacation, deleteVacation, setFollow, isAdmin }) => { const classes = useStyles() return ( <> { product.image &&

{product.name}

price: {product.price}

The Description

  • Sun Needs: Full Sun
  • Soil Needs: Damp
  • Zones: 9 - 11
  • Height: 2 - 3 feet
  • Blooms in: Mid‑Summer - Mid‑Fall
  • Features: Tolerates heat
} {/* */} {/* destination: {product.destination} about: {product.description} when: {product.start_date} - {product.end_date} price: {product.price}$ for each person */} {/* {vacation.Follows.length} Followers */} {/* */} ) } export default VacationCard
